alert.note: Alert for Accomack; Northampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 9:01PM EDT until July 25 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN ACCOMACK AND NORTHERN NORTHAMPTON COUNTIES... At 900 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Exmore, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Exmore around 915 PM EDT. Nassawadox and Willis Wharf around 925 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Birdsnest, Jamesville, Silver Beach, Eastville, Machipongo, Wardtown and Franktown. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
